attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ignore the civil liberties lobby and continue with the programme of introducing ID cards, strengthening our borders and expanding the use of CCTV to fight terrorism and organised crime.

Personal data is a fact of everyday life. The only people with anything to worry about are those with something to hide.

The benefits of ID cards and other government databases far outweigh any potential disadvantages through invasion of privacy.
